function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 may change public space design and use, affecting how people interact and move within public spaces.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases due to changes in public space design and use.","Mitigation":"Implement design changes that prioritize social distancing, ventilation, and sanitation to minimize the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Use of digital tools for urban planning, smart infrastructure for monitoring public spaces, and touchless technology for public amenities.","People":"General public, vulnerable groups, urban planners, policymakers, and public space users.","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, architects, public health officials, and technology companies."}]}
